author: mukulg
msg: fix to assertion processing on attributes, where attributes have user-defined simple types, which have assertion facets (in this case, xpath context is undefined, and the assert facet operates only on, context variable $value). this further improves XSD 1.1 assertion processing compliance, within xerces.
